module.name: layered_interconnect_module_3d_shape
module.keywords: module, interconnect, electrical, electronic, substrate, three dimensional, shape, design, layout, features

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of specialized domain specific features that require three dimensional geometric context.

inscope.li: items within the scope of Layered_interconnect_module_design_arm;
items within the scope of Part_template_3d_shape_arm.
